title: Linux Audit Logs - Overview
description: This dashboard provides insights into Linux system activity and security events through audit logs.

definition.content:
**Overview**

This dashboard tracks key system activities and security events, helping administrators monitor and analyze user actions and potential security risks.

For more information, see the [Linux Audit Logs Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/linux_audit_logs/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Linux audit logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
